title: Pago Pago Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Pago Pago Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
gold Puerto Rican
rum
(Bacardi 8 works well here)
3
squares
of
fresh pineapple
(about
1
ounce
)
1/2
ounce
fresh
lime juice
1/2
ounce
green chartreuse
1/4
ounce
white
creme de cacao
Directions
Place everything except the rum in a cocktail shaker and crush the pineapple with a muddler or wooden spoon. Add the rum and a lot of ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass (you may wish to double-strain through a mesh tea strainer in order to filter out the little bits of pineapple. Or not, if you like little bits of pineapple). Ta-da!
Rum
Pineapple
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
